rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: How every role in the company maps to the school model
Business Role
Studio (Nilo)
rows.col_4: Sets standards, provides frameworks, accredits programs, launches new schools (Trades)

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Chief of Staff
rows.col_4: Manages enrollment (hiring), tracks progress, ensures standards met, coordinates between programs

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Compliance Manager
rows.col_4: Grades the school, not the students. Independent quality assessment. Standards enforcement.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Operator (CEO)
rows.col_4: Best student who became teacher who became dean. Runs all 6 programs. Teaches by doing. Sets program priorities.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Growth / Ads Person
rows.col_4: Executes TUPs in acquisition and conversion. Learning the system while producing output.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Retention / Email Person
rows.col_4: Executes TUPs in retention and conversion programs. Manages lifecycle automations.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: Product / Ops Person
rows.col_4: Executes TUPs in product and operations. Keeps the machine running.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: VA / Admin
rows.col_4: Scheduling, coordination, data entry. Supports all programs without owning TUPs.

rows.SCHOOL ROLE MAPPING: THE PROGRESSION
STUDENT: Executes assigned TUPs under supervision. Follows curriculum. Gets graded.
→ Promotion criteria: 2 semesters of B+ or better, can write own TUPs
TEACHING ASSISTANT: Executes TUPs AND helps design curriculum for their program.
→ Promotion criteria: 2 semesters as TA with A average, can train new students
PROFESSOR: Owns a program. Designs curriculum. Evaluates students. Reports to Dean.
→ Promotion criteria: Program grades consistently B+ with growing enrollment
DEAN: Owns all programs. The Operator. Best student who became teacher who became dean.
→ This is the terminal role within a single Trade/school.
→ Further progression: launch a new school (new Trade) as Chancellor
